Uses of Class
org.sbrubbles.conditio.HandlerNotFoundException

  • Packages that use HandlerNotFoundException 
    Package Description
    org.sbrubbles.conditio
    Holds an implementation of a simple condition system.
    org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies
    Provides some alternatives to handle corner cases (e.g. no handlers for a condition), which are called policies.

    • Uses of HandlerNotFoundException in org.sbrubbles.conditio

      Methods in org.sbrubbles.conditio that throw HandlerNotFoundException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T> T Scope.raise(Condition condition, Restart<T>... restarts)
      Signals a condition that must be handled and return a result.
      <T> T Scope.signal(Condition condition, HandlerNotFoundPolicy<T> handlerNotFoundPolicy, Restart<T>... restarts)
      Signals a situation which the currently running code doesn't know how to deal with.

    • Uses of HandlerNotFoundException in org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies

      Methods in org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies that throw HandlerNotFoundException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T HandlerNotFoundPolicy.onHandlerNotFound(Condition condition, Scope scope)
      Called when no handler is found.
